title: unnaDi sArttiDu
sahitya:
unnaDi sArttiDa cenni malai sErndEn enniDar tIrndEn vanna mayilOnE


anupallavi

  tannigarE illAmal innalurum anbarait-tAngiDat-tayangAda gAngEyanE nAn


caraNam    munnaiya vinait-tollai muzhudum illAdozhikka annaiyenavE ennai anbuDan nI aNaikka
inrum iniyenrum inba sukham aLikkavE unnait-tudi sheidu uidu kaLikkavE
